Name: Super Smash the Ball VR
About the game: A cute pumpkin is left alone in a field full of nasty balls. Help the pumpkin with your magic spear to destroy them and become the champion of pumpkins. An old game is brought back into virtual reality. You, your spear and various power ups will have to destroy every ball in the game without getting hit. Climb, jump, take power ups, wear your favorite pumpkin and defeat every ball you see * Easy to play * 2 World (20 stage) * Normal / Extreme / Survival * Power Up and more over
